  • Method Details

    • getSearchResults

      @PostMapping("/user/search") public String getSearchResults(Game game, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Retrieves search results based on the provided game information and populates the model with the results. At least one of the multiplayer or singleplayer options must be selected.
      Parameters:
      game - the Game object containing search criteria
      model - the model object to add attributes
      Returns:
      the view name for displaying the search results or an error page if the selection is invalid

    • getSearchForm

      @GetMapping("/user/search") public String getSearchForm()

    • postGame

      @PostMapping("/add-game") public String postGame(@Valid @Valid Game game, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Method to add a new game to gameRepository.
      Parameters:
      game - game object
      result - validation results of the game
      model - to add attributes
      redirectAttributes - to add a Flash Attribute which disappears overtime
      Returns:
      home page

      Parameters:

      model - to add attrib
      Returns:

    • editGame

      @PostMapping("/admin/edit") public String editGame(@Valid @Valid Game game, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Method to edit existing game by given game object
      Parameters:
      game - - should be the same game as before so it's gameId will also be the entry
      result - validation result of the game object
      model - to add attribs
      Returns:
      an admin game control centre in both cases

    • deleteGame

      Parameters:
      id - Potential entry
      model - to add attribs
      Returns:
